Title: WPF 3D Framework
Description: WPF 3D .Net Framework/Library for 3D controls/ 3D UI construction, works side-by-side with WPF 3D not hiding access o capabilities from WPF.
HomeWiki:
This WPF 3D Framework/Library is built with only one goal in mind, research on 3d UIs and UXs.

This framework is based on standar WPF 3D elements and relays on standard WPF mechanisms.

To be able to understand sample code and, in general, this framework you'll need some basic knowledge of WPF and 3D.

I opened a blog (http://blogs.windowsclient.net/chus) to support the research of this project, I'll use it to blog my ideas, thoughts and develop concepts to use when build up 3D Controls and 3D UIs.

Planned releases

Initial Release Revision 2

More Information: http://www.codeplex.com/wpf3dFramework/Release/ProjectReleases.aspx?ReleaseId=10953


Enjoy!

Jesús Salas



DISCLAIMER

This Framework is a research library, do not expect a perfect code with full exception handling and zero defect, I'm trying to figure out how 3D UIs can be designed/implemented.
